Text: Sitara Deal Cc This was response from Tom on question about the deal for Bug contract on Tenn that you were unable to terminate Ive cleaned up the other deals he mentioned Brenda Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on AM From Thomas Engel AM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Sitara Deal Somehow they broke the program rules I will have to check that out deal was supposed to be ENAIM EAST as a secondary desk to the BUG deal They were able to save it as BUG as the secondary which they should not be able to do as this breaks the one deal rule per business unit per contract per time perod I cleaned up the deals for you it is the only way I could make sure it worked and removed the evergreen flag off the the BUG deal There are more deals that have May forward activity can you follow up on these dont forget to cancel the evergreen on the service deals or they will just keep rolling Forwarded by Thomas EngelHOUECT on AM Brenda H Fletcher AM To Thomas CT cc Subject Sitara Deal Deal is a Transport Capacity ticket for a BUG contract which needs to end I have been unable to change the end date to or change the demand to zero beginning When I try to release after editing the deal this message appears How can I get deal terminated Thanks Brenda

Re TGP IGP Transport Reimbursement THis is information I received on reimbursement from Enron Canada Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Laura E Scott PM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Re TGP IGP Transport Reimbursement Reimbursement includes both Brenda H Fletcher PM To Laura E CT cc Subject Re TGP IGP Transport Reimbursement The reimbursement includes both Demand and Commodity Please confirm Laura E Scott PM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Re TGP IGP Transport Reimbursement We reimburse of the total Tennessee and Iroquois charges unless Houston diverts to a more expensive place In that case we only reimburse per the maximum to Boston Brenda H Fletcher PM To Laura E CT cc Subject TGP IGP Transport Reimbursement The transportation invoice from Tennessee Gas Pipeline for service contract number for February production included in Demand Charges and in Commodity Charges Please let me know what portion and percentage of charges are reimbursed by Enron Canada Thanks Brenda

New Rate Zone SeaCrest Company LLC SEAC Cc know anything about this new pipe BF Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Faye Ellis AM To Brenda H CT cc Sylvia A CT Marlene ct Subject New Rate Zone SeaCrest Company LLC SEAC Brenda I have set up a new intrastate pipe SeaCreast CompanyLLC SEAC I can add a rate zone to match the pipe code Pipe Code SEAC Rate Zone SEAC Please notify me otherwise Thanks Faye

Capacity Deal tickets Cc answer Melbas question below regarding the new desk Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Melba A Bowen PM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Re Capacity Deal tickets Thanks for the info Do you know what the key is to make sure the tickets show up in Unify on the right desk Also how do we assure flash is on right desk or is this not going to be an issue if we are using the Service P l to flash If we use the Service P L to flash will the transport info in Unify and the flash amts be the same and on the same desk How this makes sense Brenda H Fletcher PM To Melba A CT Mary Theresa CT Carrie ct Jeanne NRON cc Subject Capacity Deal tickets FYI Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Sylvia A CT Linda S CT Marlene ct Dana NRON Stephanie CT Sherry CT Bryce CT cc David CT Crystal CT Scott NRON Brenda H CT Dan CT Judy CT Subject Capacity Deal tickets Effective April st we will have several Transport Capacity tickets set up under desk Market East and East All longhaul capacity on Tetco Trco and Tenn will be set up under both desk All capacity on CNG Iroq Equit Nat Fuel and CGAS will be Market East Now all of our current capacity on these pipes is either Bug which goes away on or East So even on these pipes you will probably see the same contract under both desk Commentsquestions
CGASCGLF Fuel Cc Unify tables are updated for the fuel changes on CGAS and CGLF effective Attached is a spreadsheet with the calculations for zone to zone fuel percentages

Hunt Petroleum Cc the CES expert Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on AM Enron North America Corp From Megan Parker ENRON AM To Brenda H CT Chris CT cc Subject Hunt Petroleum The contract for Hunt Petroleum has been assigned from CES to Enron I need someone to change the names on deals and from CESHunt Petroleum to Hunt Petroleum without CES All of the deals are on the East desk Let me know if this request is to go to one of you or if I need to forward this to someone else Thanks Megan

Re New Power Demand Chargethe month scheduling fee part of the Is the demand charge for all of the reimbursements on all pipelines combined BF Chris Germany PM To Kimat CT Brenda H CT cc Subject New Power Demand Charge I added a demand charge of to deal for Dec I dont think this should show up in the current month PL at least not from this deal ticket Let me know if there are any problems This demand charge is for the Market East and for the month scheduling fee We are still working on the East demand charges for New Power

Re Equitrans Cc The last demand charge for was on the August invoice Chris Germany AM To Brenda H CT Mary Theresa CT cc Subject Equitrans Are we still getting a demand charge bill from Equitrans for contract I am still estimating about per month

Eastern States Oil Gas Cc Can you answer this BF Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on AM Gloria G Barkowsky AM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Eastern States Oil Gas Forwarded by Gloria G BarkowskyHOUECT on AM Gloria G Barkowsky AM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Eastern States Oil Gas Brenda isnt there a Cornwell pool and Hastings pool that is not an imbalance account ESOG does not carry an imbalance but right now I cannot enter any volumes in these imbalance accounts Let me know Thanks Gloria

CES Direct Meters for CNGyou aware of these contracts Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Gloria G Barkowsky PM To Sylvia A CT cc Brenda H CT Subject CES Direct Meters for CNG Sylvia I have received the invoices for the direct meters for for CNG for CES and CEM but the contracts are not in path manager and I cant pull them up in Global contracts Can you take care of this Let me know if I need to send this to someone else also let me know if you need anything from me Thanks Gloria CEM Contract G CEM G CES GA CES GA CES GA CES G CES TA

Re Cove Point ContractPre Jan It should be Market East Chris Germany AM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Re Cove Point Contract I cant remember should the VNG demand charges be on Im VNG or East and Market East Forwarded by Chris GermanyHOUECT on AM Scott NRON AM To Scott NRON cc Chris CT Brenda H CT Victoria CT Joann NRON Alvin nron Subject Re Cove Point Contract Carol Herman said the mdq is and the rate is Chris please look at the deal in sitara I copied the October deal that had a reservation volume of Scott Scott Goodell AM To Chris CT Brenda H CT Victoria CT cc Joann NRON Alvin nron Subject Cove Point Contract I entered the VNG Cove Point contract FPS in sitara The deals are as follows IM VNG Im Market East Im East I have a call into Transcos Carol Herman to get the correct rate

Re NFUL Cc probably be a good idea and may correct problems Alfonso has had on volume side Chris Germany AM To Sylvia A CT Brenda H CT cc Subject NFUL I bet everything we did in June July and August is wrong in Unify as well I wonder if we should go back to June st on setting up this contract We dont have that much activity on this contract Let me know

Re Cove Point Storageis the last email I recd on Cove Point Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Chris Germany AM To David CT Crystal CT Alex CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Angie NRON Mark CT Brenda H CT cc Scott NRON Dan CT Molly CT Judy CT Dick CT Scott CT Sarah CT Robin CT Maureen CT Subject Re Cove Point Storage Just making sure everyone reads their emails The term is Brenda H Fletcher AM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Cove Point Storage Are you sure about the term Chris Germany AM To David CT Crystal CT Alex CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Angie NRON Mark CT Brenda H CT cc Scott NRON Dan CT Molly CT Judy CT Dick CT Scott CT Sarah CT Robin CT Maureen CT Subject Cove Point Storage We have a new Cove Point Storage deal here are the details Term MSQ MDWQ Demand Demand Charge for April Demand Charge for May March month Contract FPS The CPR storage injection deal is the withdrawal ticket is I entered all the withdrawal volumes to come out of storage the last days of March

CES Direct Meters for CNGyou aware of these contracts Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Gloria G Barkowsky PM To Sylvia A CT cc Brenda H CT Subject CES Direct Meters for CNG Sylvia I have received the invoices for the direct meters for for CNG for CES and CEM but the contracts are not in path manager and I cant pull them up in Global contracts Can you take care of this Let me know if I need to send this to someone else also let me know if you need anything from me Thanks Gloria CEM Contract G CEM G CES GA CES GA CES GA CES G CES TA

Re Cove Point Storageis the last email I recd on Cove Point Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Chris Germany AM To David CT Crystal CT Alex CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Angie NRON Mark CT Brenda H CT cc Scott NRON Dan CT Molly CT Judy CT Dick CT Scott CT Sarah CT Robin CT Maureen CT Subject Re Cove Point Storage Just making sure everyone reads their emails The term is Brenda H Fletcher AM To Chris CT cc Subject Re Cove Point Storage Are you sure about the term Chris Germany AM To David CT Crystal CT Alex CT Victor CT Katherine L CT Joan NRON Joann NRON Robert CT Angie NRON Mark CT Brenda H CT cc Scott NRON Dan CT Molly CT Judy CT Dick CT Scott CT Sarah CT Robin CT Maureen CT Subject Cove Point Storage We have a new Cove Point Storage deal here are the details Term MSQ MDWQ Demand Demand Charge for April Demand Charge for May March month Contract FPS The CPR storage injection deal is the withdrawal ticket is I entered all the withdrawal volumes to come out of storage the last days of March

Capacity Deal tickets Cc answer Melbas question below regarding the new desk Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Melba A Bowen PM To Brenda H CT cc Subject Re Capacity Deal tickets Thanks for the info Do you know what the key is to make sure the tickets show up in Unify on the right desk Also how do we assure flash is on right desk or is this not going to be an issue if we are using the Service P l to flash If we use the Service P L to flash will the transport info in Unify and the flash amts be the same and on the same desk How this makes sense Brenda H Fletcher PM To Melba A CT Mary Theresa CT Carrie ct Jeanne NRON cc Subject Capacity Deal tickets FYI Forwarded by Brenda H FletcherHOUECT on PM Chris Germany PM To Sylvia A CT Linda S CT Marlene ct Dana NRON Stephanie CT Sherry CT Bryce CT cc David CT Crystal CT Scott NRON Brenda H CT Dan CT Judy CT Subject Capacity Deal tickets Effective April st we will have several Transport Capacity tickets set up under desk Market East and East All longhaul capacity on Tetco Trco and Tenn will be set up under both desk All capacity on CNG Iroq Equit Nat Fuel and CGAS will be Market East Now all of our current capacity on these pipes is either Bug which goes away on or East So even on these pipes you will probably see the same contract under both desk Commentsquestions
